thread.title: OnePlus 2 launch on Tuesday; all you need to know about its price and specs in 5 points
thread.title_full: OnePlus 2 launch on Tuesday; all you need to know about its price and specs in 5 points | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: OnePlus 2 launch on Tuesday; all you need to know about its price and specs in 5 points
text:
Other Articles Reckitt Benckiser raises guidance after strong half Tata Opportunities Fund invests $55 mn in Tata Projects Tata Power reaffirms green commitment; plants over one lakh saplings in centenary year OnePlus 2 smartphone will be launching on July 27 at 7 p.m. Pacific Time (i.e. around 7.30 a.m. in India) through a virtual reality event. The company would however be organising a separate event in New Delhi to celebrate the launch. From price to specifications, here are 5 points to note:
1) Smartphone OnePlus 2 first to launch in virtual reality
The most-awaited phone, OnePlus 2, will launch through a 360 degree virtual reality (VR) event across the globe.
2) OnePlus 2 price, specs
Earlier in July, OnePlus made a few revelations regarding the price and specifications of the phone on social networking site Twitter.
On July 6, OnePlus CEO Pete Lau promised OnePlus 2 priced to be under $450.
Other revelations made about OnePlus 2 specs are: Type C-USB por, LPDDR4 RAM and 64-bit Snapdragon 810 processor.
3) OnePlus VR app
To attend the launch, one has to download the VR app from Google play store.
4) Attendees need cardboard to enjoy the 360 degree immersive experience
It is also recommended for attendees to use either a Google cardboard or OnePlus cardboard for better experience. However, if you can’t arrange a cardboard, Oneplus has also built a cardboard-free 360 experience in their app, which they have claimed would still be interactive.
5) Invites for OnePlus 2
To buy OnePlus 2, one will need an invite. Those who haven’t got it yet can register themselves on the website by simply submitting their email Id. The invite would guarantee that the registered person will be able to buy OnePlus 2 phone.
After purchasing, customers would get invites to share with friends and family.
 4:00 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
